mapper.update: UPDATE apply_form SET result_date = NOW(), result_type = 1 WHERE apply_form_key = #{applyFormKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apply_form ( apply_email, apply_insert_name, apply_phone_number, apply_contents, apply_url, apply_insert_date, file_memo, user_master_key, apply_type ) values ( #{applyEmail}, #{applyInsertName}, #{applyPhoneNumber}, #{applyFormSelect}, #{applyUrl}, NOW(), #{fileMemo}, #{userMasterKey}, #{applyType} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.apply_form_key, a.apply_email, a.apply_insert_name, a.apply_phone_number, a.apply_contents, a.apply_url, a.apply_insert_date, a.file_memo, a.result_type, a.result_date, (SELECT b.user_id FROM user_master b WHERE b.user_master_key = a.user_master_key) AS user_id, (SELECT CASE WHEN a.apply_type = '3' THEN '시간이용권' WHEN a.apply_type = '1' THEN '무료체험권' WHEN a.apply_type = '9' THEN '클앱멤버십' END) AS apply_type, af.file_name, af.file_saved_name, af.file_path FROM apply_form a LEFT OUTER JOIN ADMINISTRATION_FILE af on a.apply_form_key = af.file_target_key WHERE apply_insert_date IS NOT NULL AND a.apply_form_key=#{applyFormKey} AND af.file_target = #{fileTarget}
